I’ve had unprotected anal sex with multiple partners in the past few weeks, and I’m worried it might be something sexually transmitted. I haven’t experienced anything like this before and I’m pretty concerned about what it could be.

At first, it wasn’t that bad, but then I started seeing some bleeding when I go to the bathroom, and there’s been some kind of discharge too. Now it’s gotten worse — the pain’s more noticeable, and there’s some swelling around the area. I’ve been worried, I guess, because I’ve had unprotected anal sex with a few different people recently, and I just thought I should have it checked out.
